predicate.note: Frames file for 'overwhelm' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

roleset.name: overwhelm

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The issue's smooth absorption eased fears that supply would overwhelm demand in coming sessions, traders said.

example.name: all args
example.text: John overwhelmed his dissertation committee with the brilliance of his arguments.

roleset.note: Only use the instrument arg when the agent arg is also present.
